HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Za proizvode do 5kg je 5,50€ a za teže proizvode 10€+ ( npr. gume, felge itd.)
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Standardni rok dostave je 3 do 5 radna dana.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Iznimka su otoci i mjesta koja ne podržavaju svakodnevnu dostavu, a gdje je dostava moguća prema posebnim uvjetima dostave.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Za artikle većih dimenzija (kabasti artikli poput karoserijskih dijelova, krovnih kutija i sl.) moguć je naknadni izračun i veća cijena dostave od navedene. Trošak dostave akumulatora na adresu je 14,93 €.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Iznimka su otoci i mjesta koja ne podržavaju svakodnevnu dostavu, a gdje je dostava moguća prema posebnim uvjetima dostave.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The primary delivery method is home delivery via unspecified courier services. There is no mention of parcel shop, parcel locker, or in-store pickup options.
PRICING: Standard delivery costs €5.50 for packages up to 5kg and €10+ for heavier items. Bulky items require a custom price calculation. Shipping for car batteries is a flat €14.93. Express delivery is available for €10.62. No free shipping threshold is mentioned.
DELIVERY TIME: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days. Express delivery (Molydon Express24) is available within 24 hours for in-stock items.
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery to Croatian islands is subject to 'special conditions,' but these are not detailed. Delivery is made to the building entrance, not to the apartment door.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Offers an 'Express24' service for fast delivery. Special handling and pricing for hazardous materials like car batteries. Damaged shipments are replaced if reported immediately with photos.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a single, easy-to-find page. However, it lacks crucial details such as the names of the courier partners, specific conditions and surcharges for island deliveries, and information on cash-on-delivery fees. The absence of alternative delivery options like parcel lockers or in-store pickup is a notable limitation.
